attributes.action: To stop the government from shutting down energywatch / setting a new watchdog for energy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Energy companies are useless when it comes to advice and support. Energywatch are able to offer a more helpful platform to voice your concerns and get advice.

We should be able to let Energywatch continue and stop the government from changing the structure as we as consumers will suffer. Energy companies will make more money as they will be handling all complaints and no one to turn to when you get "fobbed off"

Sign this petition to stop the government from shutting down energywatch.
